sentence: PHOENIX – A judge this week declined Secretary of State Katie Hobbs' request for an order blocking Arizona's attorney general from prosecuting her if she temporarily shuts down a candidate signature portal for a required update.
author: Associated Press
title: Arizona judge declines Katie Hobbs’ request to block Brnovich threats

sentence: I think that is part of the reason why she is able to work with others on the other side of the aisle because she doesn’t burn the bridges that way.” Desai has been a critical part of the legal teams that defended the Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, a Democrat, and the Arizona Democratic Party in multiple cases that all were unsuccessful in reversing the election.
title: ‘I don’t have a lot of fear about speaking truth to power’: Roopali Desai honored by USA TODAY

sentence: The lawsuit names as defendants both the state and Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, a Democrat running for governor.
author: Amy Sherman
title: Voting by mail has been popular in Arizona for decades. Now the state GOP wants to ban it

sentence: The lawsuit also made two other arguments: that Secretary of State Katie Hobbs erred by including rules for ballot drop boxes in the election procedures manual and by not including signature verification procedures.
title: Arizona Supreme Court rejects GOP request to invalidate mail voting

sentence: "Today, the Arizona Supreme Court dismissed a dangerous lawsuit that threatened early voting in the state and challenged provisions of the Elections Procedures Manual," tweeted Katie Hobbs, Arizona's Democratic secretary of state.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: GOP-led Arizona Supreme Court shuts down Republican bid to ban early voting

sentence: Earlier this week, Arizona Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, a Democrat and a defendant in the lawsuit, condemned the state GOP’s attempt to eradicate mail-in voting.
author: Chris Walker
title: Arizona Supreme Court Rejects State GOP Lawsuit to Eliminate Mail-In Voting

sentence: Arizona voters will still be able to vote early, access drop boxes, and make their voices heard.pic.twitter.com/awWo5A6PF3 — Secretary Katie Hobbs (@Secretary Katie Hobbs) 1649203544 Hobbs is currently seeking the Democratic gubernatorial nomination.
author: Brandon Gage
title: 'Petitioners have not persuaded the Court': Arizona Supreme Court tosses GOP lawsuit to eliminate early voting

author: Chibueze Godwin
title: Arizona Supreme Court Rejects GOP Move To Abolish Mail Voting

sentence: PHOENIX (AP) — Republican Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich is joining with Republican Party officials to sue Democratic Secretary of State Katie Hobbs in an escalation of a dispute over the election procedures manual she is required to complete.
author: BOB CHRISTIE - Associated Press
title: Brnovich sues Hobbs in dispute over election procedures
